restriccion3: $$ x_{ij} \leq y_j \ \forall i \in P, \forall j \in P$$
restriccion4: $$ \sum_{i \in P} t_i x_{ij} \leq (1 + \epsilon)\dfrac{\displaystyle\sum_{i \in P}t_i}{k} y_j \ \forall j \in C$$
restriccion5: $$ \sum_{i \in P} t_i x_{ij} \geq (1 - \epsilon)\dfrac{\displaystyle\sum_{i \in P}t_i}{k} y_j \ \forall j \in C$$
